title: Arastasia

properties.name: description
properties.value: Arastasia was the daughter of an unnamed lord. A farm hand from her father's farm, Dentristus loved her.[1] During a harsh winter, the Wintertodt was drawn from the north devouring animals and crops,[2] which caused Arastasia to weep at the fear and distress caused to her people.[3] Dentristus vowed to defeat the Wintertodt, and in exchange the lord offered Arastasia's hand in marriage.[4] Though this would never come to pass as Dentristus was defeated.[5]

content:
Arastasia was the daughter of an unnamed lord. A farm hand from her father's farm, Dentristus loved her.[1] During a harsh winter, the Wintertodt was drawn from the north devouring animals and crops,[2] which caused Arastasia to weep at the fear and distress caused to her people.[3] Dentristus vowed to defeat the Wintertodt, and in exchange the lord offered Arastasia's hand in marriage.[4] Though this would never come to pass as Dentristus was defeated.[5]

References[edit | edit source]

  1. ↑ Wintertodt parable, Old School RuneScape. "His lord had a beautiful daughter, Arastasia, with whom he was in love"
  2. ↑ Wintertodt parable, Old School RuneScape. "That winter was the Great Winter which drew down the Wintertodt from the north, It proceeded to devour the animals upon the farm and freezing the next year's crops."
  3. ↑ Wintertodt parable, Old School RuneScape. "The lord had no food and Arastasia wept at the fear and distress caused to her people."
  4. ↑ Wintertodt parable, Old School RuneScape. "I vow that I will venture into the mountains and destroy the beast so it shall trouble us no more.... ...if you succeed I will grant you my daughter's hand in marriage as you will truly be the only man that can make her happy."
  5. ↑ Wintertodt parable, Old School RuneScape. "Dentristus lay dead before he even saw the Wintertodt"
